name: Serious Cookies: Cherry Coconut Bars
description: [Photograph: Gina DePalma] Every year, I spend my post-Thanksgiving weekend trying to gather my thoughts about my personal holiday baking lineup. And like most people, those initial thoughts always take a nostalgic turn before checking out the latest cookbook or...
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup (1 stick, 4 ounces) cold butter, cut in even sized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine flour and confectioners' sugar. Add the butter pieces and toss to coat, then rub the butter into the flour to form coarse, raggedy crumbs. Using lightly floured fingers, evenly press the pastry mixture into a lightly greased and floured 13 x 9-inch rectangular cake pan.
Bake the pastry layer for 10 to 12 minutes, or until it just begins to turn light golden brown at the edges.
For the filling, whisk the eggs, sugar and vanilla in a medium bowl. Combine flour, baking powder and salt and whisk into the egg mixture. Stir in nuts, cherries and coconut.
